name: Free Online XMind Viewer - ATools
description: Open and preview .xmind files online. Runs locally in your browser (no uploads) with Canvas preview and Markdown outline export.
seoDescription: A fast, privacy-first XMind Viewer that opens .xmind files directly in your browser with zero uploads. Supports both modern content.json and classic content.xml formats, provides a large Canvas mind map preview (pan/zoom/fit), and lets you copy or download a Markdown outline for notes, planning, and knowledge management.
